name: Consecrated Flying Serpent
desc:
Remnant Squall: Consecrated Flying Serpent

A flying serpent that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. Now, it commands the fearsome winds.

value.name: Deathly Cyclone
value.desc:
Consecrated Flying Serpent: Deathly Cyclone

Though now imbued with the power of elemental manipulation, the Consecrated Beasts themselves still cannot fully digest the pieces of flesh they devoured from immortal carcasses. Instead, the pieces slowly fused with the beasts themselves, changing them...

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Consecrated Flying Serpent

value.name: Consecrated Flying Serpent
value.desc:
A reptile that has mutated after feeding from greater lifeforms.

Though now imbued with the power of elemental manipulation, the Consecrated Beasts themselves still cannot fully digest the pieces of flesh they devoured from the immortal carcasses that they ate. Instead, the pieces slowly fused with the beasts themselves, weaving a bony shell over their body, one that shares a similar composition to a certain type of smelting material from Inazuma.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deal 3 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> and draw 1 card.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> . <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> all <color=#ffffff>Bonecruncher's Energy Block</color> cards in your Hand. Double the DMG dealt once for every 2 cards you <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When battle begins, create 6 <color=#ffffff>Bonecruncher's Energy Block</color> and place them evenly into your deck.

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
Randomly <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> 1 card from your Hand with the highest original Cost and create 1 Elemental Die of your active character's Element. (Only 1 such card can be played per Round)

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Discard</color>
Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
<color=#ece5d8>Energy</color>
Characters must consume Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.
When characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 Energy.

customize.name: Consecrated Flying Serpent
customize.desc:
Remnant Squall: Consecrated Flying Serpent

A flying serpent that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. Now, it commands the fearsome winds.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Consecrated Flying Serpent's Assault

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "Cats are very sensitive to danger, and that of course includes the movements of poisonous snakes..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: This opponent engages in a Duel with you rather than an Adventure Challenge. The Consecrated Flying Serpent starts with the Talent Card "Deathly Cyclone" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Consecrated Flying Serpent's Predation

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "However, the sounds that a desert flying serpent makes are quite different from that of ordinary snakes. It's like a strange wind passing through â€” and one that we've got to be especially careful to watch out for..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: This opponent engages in a Duel with you rather than an Adventure Challenge. The Consecrated Flying Serpent starts with the Talent Card "Deathly Cyclone" equipped, and the Consecrated Scorpion starts with the Talent Card "Fatal Fulmination" equipped.</color>
